name: DYNO Mapper Content Import Plugin
author: DYNO Mapper

sections.description:
DYNO Mapper Content Import plugin allows you to initialize your WordPress site’s page structure, content and navigation menus with your selected DYNO Mapper project.

The plugin is designed to be simple and straightforward. Just follow the step-by-step instructions of the import flow.

About DYNO Mapper

DYNO Mapper is an online platform for creating or generating visual sitemaps, manage content inventory, content audit, content planning, daily keyword tracking, and website and PDF accessibility testing.
sections.installation:
1. Upload dynomapper-content-import to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the DYNO Mapper Content Import plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Tools > Import page. Click Run Importer under DYNO Mapper Content Import
sections.faq:
Does the DYNO Mapper Content Import plugin needs a subscription to DYNO Mapper to work?

Yes.

short_description: This plugin allows you to import your DYNO Mapper project's page structure and content into your Wordpress site.
